original: intros m x x' H_inv H_planar H_double_link. unfold double_link in H_double_link. destruct H_double_link as [H_neq H_expe]. set (y := cA m zero x). set (y' := cA m zero x'). case_eq (expf_dec m y y'); intro H_expf_dec. - assert (H_not_eqc : ~ eqc (Br1 m x x') x y'). { apply disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1 with (m := m); try auto. } assert (H_not_eqc' : ~ eqc (Br1 m x x') x' y). { apply disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1_bis with (m := m); try auto. } rewrite nc_B with (k := zero) (x := x) in H_not_eqc; try auto. rewrite nc_B with (k := zero) (x := x') in H_not_eqc'; try auto. simpl in H_not_eqc, H_not_eqc'. destruct (eqc_dec (B m zero x) x (A m zero x)) eqn:H_eqc_dec_x. + destruct (eqc_dec (B m zero x') x' (A m zero x')) eqn:H_eqc_dec_x'. * rewrite Z.add_0_r. rewrite Z.add_0_r in H_eqc_dec_x, H_eqc_dec_x'. simpl in H_not_eqc, H_not_eqc'. rewrite H_eqc_dec_x, H_eqc_dec_x'. simpl. rewrite H_expf_dec. symmetry. apply Z.add_1_r. * exfalso. apply H_eqc_dec_x'. apply H_not_eqc'. + exfalso. apply H_eqc_dec_x. apply H_not_eqc. - assert (H_not_expf : ~ expf m y y') by (intro H; apply H_expf_dec; assumption). assert (H_eqc : eqc (Br1 m x x') x' y). { apply disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1_bis with (m := m); try auto. } rewrite nc_B with (k := zero) (x := x) in H_eqc; try auto. simpl in H_eqc. destruct (eqc_dec (B m zero x) x (A m zero x)) eqn:H_eqc_dec_x. + exfalso. apply H_not_expf. apply expf_not_expf_B0 with (m := m) (x := x); auto. + rewrite Z.add_comm. simpl. rewrite <- Z.add_1_r. rewrite H_expf_dec. symmetry. apply Z.add_0_r.
